Monero transaction is about as big as Beam Lelantus-MW ones (1.7KB vs 2KB). Monero offers hiding in an anonymity set of 11, while Beam offers to hide together with 65,536 other inputs. That's a 5000x improvement in potential privacy.

If this is true, which I hope it’s not, $ARRR will take the cake for the most private transaction ecosystem.  With z2z only and encrypted memos in transactions, I don’t see why it can’t be a fantastic alternative to $XMR  I have some reading to do.   https://t.co/tHZ9oouFuT
